entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is trying to understand Dumbledore's intentions.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is trying to protect Harry from Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who is trying to kill Harry and rule the wizarding world.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Objects that contain pieces of Voldemort's soul and are necessary for his immortality.

relationships.description: Harry is interacting with Dumbledore, trying to understand his intentions.
Dumbledore is connected to Voldemort through the Horcruxes.
Harry is concerned about the Horcruxes and their connection to Voldemort.
